query:
SELECT 
  c.id,
  c.name,
  c.slug,
  COUNT(p.id) as product_count
FROM categories c
LEFT JOIN products p ON c.id = p.categoryId
GROUP BY c.id, c.name, c.slug
ORDER BY c.id;
command:
